mapper.update: update ums_admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time, status from ums_admin where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time, status from ums_admin
